answers.answer: That is quite a bit to lose in such a short time, but I wouldn't be too concerned. A lot is water weight-- it is common to get dehydrated while fighting a virus, especially if you've been throwing up or having diarrhea. Losing muscle mass is also a result from being bed-ridden for a while. It is also completely natural to lose your appetite when you are sick; the body naturally wants to fast to rid itself of the toxins.You could call your doctor to get a second opinion, but I think as long as you stay hydrated and get right back to a healthy diet asap, you should feel stronger again.All the best,Brittany
